name: Digital Dogfight Simulator
description:
---------Info---------

This is the new and exciting DDFS(Digital Dogfight Simulator) and totally not a bad copy of DCS. No, but really I am a huge fan of DCS and have some interest in coding so I decided to make a version I can play on the web for when I'm not home. Hope you enjoy it and plz don't sue me Eagle Dynamics.

-------Controls-------

---Keyboard---

W  = Pitch down

A = Roll left

S = Pitch up

D = Roll right

Q = Yaw left

E = Yaw right

F = Flaps On/off

Shift = Throttle up

Ctrl = Throttle down

ESC = Pause

R = Zoom

T = target zoom

C = look around

1 = weapon one

2 = weapon two

3 = weapon three

4 = Cannon

Space/right-click = fire

---Xbox controller---

Left Joystick = Pitch/roll

A = Fire
